about_the_game:
A mix of terrifying intensity and dreamy flow make this music pack a unique and must-have music collection.

Nightmares takes you on a musical journey that quickly moves from eerie and slightly unsettling into tense and purely terrifying. Inspired by some of the best horror games and TV shows, each song is expertly composed by JDB Artist to create the perfect ambiance. Whether you're working on a monstrous chase scene or a simple flashback scene, Nightmares is the pack for you.

This pack contains:

  • 40 themes, including 9 bonus themes.
  • Over an hour of exceptional music.
  • Quality compositions, using a variety of instruments and sounds.
  • BONUS: format for easy listening while you work or relax.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Nightmares Music Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Nightmares Music Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
